Ather Tab - Synced Notes in Tab, Popup, and Side Panel

Overview Ather Tab is abeautiful new-tab notepad extension that syncs your notes across all Chromium-based browsers, including Chrome, Edge, Brave, and more. With Ather Tab, your new tab becomes a personal, editable notepad. It also includes a popup and side panel for quick access and editing.

# Key Features

Sync Across Devices: Notes are synced across all devices where bookmark syncing is enabled, making your notes accessible from any browser.

Multiple Interfaces: Access Ather Tab from the new tab, popup, or side panel.

Automatic Saving: Notes are automatically saved, with backup storage to keep your data safe.

Editing Shortcuts: Use shortcuts like CTRL + ; to insert the date and time instantly.

Customization: Choose between dark and light themes, adjust font size, and keep track of word and character counts.


# Important Details

Bookmark-Based Storage: Notes are stored within bookmarks, enabling sync across devices where Chrome sync is active.

Character Limit: Limited to approximately 8000 characters due to browser constraints. You can download and back up your notes to save space for new text.

Mobile Editing: Access and edit notes from mobile devices by syncing bookmarks.


# Permissions

Bookmarks and Storage: Necessary for syncing and saving notes across devices.

Side Panel: Used to display Ather Tab in the side panel for easy access.


Known Issues

Limited Storage Space: The bookmark-based storage has a character limit.

Sync Delays: Refresh the side panel if you notice any syncing issues with the new tab.
